ai-tika-s0303t9:0_0: commentary on the colour of scents,
ai-tika-s0303t9:1_1: Once scents, fragrant scents, perfumes, and garlands, perfumes, and flowers don’t flow. The body is produced by fragrances.
ai-tika-s0303t9:1_2: And the thirteen flags of the four kinds of fairy kings—from there should be seen each one in the presence of the gods.
ai-tika-s0303t9:1_3: The roots of trees became embarken. The roots, fragrant roots, and perfumes all.
ai-tika-s0303t9:1_4: having mastered all roots, he dwells on having mastered the root,
ai-tika-s0303t9:1_6: and returning to the root of a tree.
ai-tika-s0303t9:1_7: There is no reason for us to give it upside there. It is no cause or condition for the sake of this that.
ai-tika-s0303t9:1_8: He is satisfied by the power of the one who gives his sanity, and he devotes (only) to the state (of existence).
ai-tika-s0303t9:1_9: Smells, smells, tastes, touches, and thoughts.
ai-tika-s0303t9:1_10: The meaning is, etc., which is flowing scented by roots, etc., is the meaning. It is scented by smells, etc., which is the meaning.
ai-tika-s0303t9:1_11: It is because he thinks “Perhaps there a tree fell into the sky’s scent, etc., and that tree is only here and there,
ai-tika-s0303t9:1_12: Hence it is said: “Well then, we shall go to the tree.”
ai-tika-s0303t9:1_13: That roots, smells, tastes, touches, and thoughts are called “mindful”.
ai-tika-s0303t9:1_14: (Smetimes) with the sweet-smelling smells, (but) while the colour of the fragrant scent,
ai-tika-s0303t9:1_15: Remembering the warrior-noble on all sides.
ai-tika-s0303t9:1_16: Theymate the fruits once more, and don’t overpower. They’ve shelled the fruits that end with fruit.
ai-tika-s0303t9:1_17: And even he gives the gift of merit to all beings, saying: “This give gifts to who have merit.”
ai-tika-s0303t9:2_0: The Linked Discourses on fairykind is finished.
